ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber looks at Redhot funny. Catty? If you mean a bit quick on the gun, than yeah. Once you get his trust though, he ll risk his life for you.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber looks at Redhot funny. "Catty? If you mean a bit quick on
the gun, than yeah. Once you get his trust though, he'll risk his life
for you." Beachcomber began to speak outloud. "Ummm, so what's our next
move?" he asked. Cliffjumper turned around, and waved Torca and Klant
up. "Well until you join the Autobots, I reserve Judgement." Cliffjumper
said to Redhot.
